author: mjussim
title: The 10 most beautiful photos of actress Kate Beckinsale
text:
The 10 most beautiful photos of actress Kate Beckinsale The ‘Underworld’ and ‘Total Recall’ star shows off her most stunning looks. by Men's Fitness Editors View gallery (10) 
After four Underworld movies, we know two things for certain about actress Kate Beckinsale: She can kick ass, and she looks good doing it. 
The stunning actress is back again as the vampire Selene in Underworld: Blood Wars , the fifth installment of the action franchise. Since Beckinsale first picked up her guns for the franchise original back in 2003, the series has made over $500 million at the box office. She's red-hot. 
Beckinsale has shown range throughout her career in big budget films like Pearl Harbor , Van Helsing , and Total Recall , independent dramas like Love & Friendship and Brokedown Palace , as well as romantic comedies like Serendipity and Click —but she’s at her most badass when she’s taking down werewolves and saving the day. 
Here are Beckinsale’s most beautiful looks. 
Underworld: Blood Wars , directed by Anna Foerster, will be released on February 3, 2017. The 10 most beautiful photos of actress Kate Beckinsale 1 of 10 
Kate Beckinsale attends the 'China: Through The Looking Glass' Costume Institute Benefit Gala at the Metropolitan Museum of Art on May 4, 2015 in New York City. 
Kate Beckinsale attends the 'IL Gattopardo' Premiere at the Palais des Festivals during the 63rd Annual Cannes Film Festival on May 14, 2010 in Cannes, France. 
Kate Beckinsale attends the 2016 Vanity Fair Oscar Party Hosted By Graydon Carter at the Wallis Annenberg Center for the Performing Arts on February 28, 2016 in Beverly Hills, California 
Actress Kate Beckinsale attends the Battersea Power Station launch party to celebrate the launch of its Global Tour at The London West Hollywood on November 6, 2014 in West Hollywood, United States. 
Actress Kate Beckinsale attends the Burberry 'London in Los Angeles' event at Griffith Observatory on April 16, 2015 in Los Angeles, California. 
Kate Beckinsale attends the Dior Welcome Dinner at the Lady Dior Pub to celebrate the Cruise Collection 2017 on May 30, 2016 in London, England. 
Actress Kate Beckinsale attends the premiere of Columbia Pictures and Village Roadshow Pictures 'The Brothers Grimsby' at Regency Village Theatre on March 3, 2016 in Westwood, California. 
Actress Kate Beckinsale arrives at the Hollywood Foreign Press Association and InStyle celebrate the 2017 Golden Globe Award Season at Catch LA on November 10, 2016 in West Hollywood, California. 
Actress Kate Beckinsale arrives at the premiere of Screen Gems' 'Underworld: Awakening' at Grauman's Chinese Theatre on January 19, 2012 in Hollywood, California. 
ctress Kate Beckinsale attends the 2016 Billboard Music Awards at T-Mobile Arena on May 22, 2016 in Las Vegas, Nevada. 10 photos
